Home.header: find the place you can call home

ListingPage.calculator-description: Using this calculator you may calculate your monthly payment if you decide to buy this property. Please note that this calculation is purely informational and may not be used in any other way. Please contact your bank for more information.
ListingPage.travel-time-description: Check your travel time from this property to your work, store or your favourite beach
ListingPage.listing-will-be-sent: Listing will be sent along with your message.

ListingsPage.none-found: We couldn't find any listings that match your filter!

AccountPage.enter-username-message: Please enter your username below so that you can may start submitting listings!

CompanyPage.click-here: Click here to create a new company.
CompanyPage.name: Company Name
CompanyPage.members-description: Company members. All members can be listed as contacts when creating a new listing. Registered members can also submit new listings.
CompanyPage.invite-member-description: If the member has an open Imovinko account, enter their e-mail or username to invite them into the company.
CompanyPage.manual-member-description: Manually enter information about a member. This member can then be listed as a contact when submitting a new ad.
CompanyPage.registered-users-2: icon next to their names are registered members.
CompanyPage.success-message: User will recieve notification about the company invite.
CompanyPage.username-or-email: Username or e-mail of the member

CreateCompanyPage.title: Company Information
CreateCompanyPage.name-description: Company name. Please note that this value can not be changed later.
CreateCompanyPage.pin-description: Company Personal Identification Number. Please note that this value can not be changed later.
CreateCompanyPage.web-page-description: If the company has its own website, please fill in the full link to the website here.
CreateCompanyPage.store-name-description: Name of the store which will be shown on company listings. If this field is left empty, the name of the company will be shown instead

CompanyByPrettyIdPage.no-data-message: This company currently has no active listings.

Notifications.invited-you: has invited you to join the company as a member

CalculatorPage.calculator-description: Using this calculator you may calculate your monthly payment based on some input parameters. Please note that this calculation is purely informational and may not be used in any other way. Please contact your bank for more information.

Privacy.1: Imovinko operates the www.imovinko.com website, which provides the ability to browse real estate listings.
Privacy.2: This page is used to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Imovinko website.
Privacy.3: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect are used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
Privacy.4: For a better experience while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, phone number, and postal address. The information that we collect will be used to contact or identify you.
Privacy.5: We want to inform you that whenever you visit our Service, we collect information that your browser sends to us that is called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser version, pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and other statistics.
Privacy.6: Cookies are files with small amount of data that is commonly used an anonymous unique identifier. These are sent to your browser from the website that you visit and are stored on your computer's hard drive.
Privacy.7: Our website uses these "cookies" to collection information and to improve our Service. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies, and know when a cookie is being sent to your computer. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
Privacy.8: We may employ third-party companies and individuals. We want to inform our users that these third parties have access to a small amount of your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
Privacy.9: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Privacy.10: Our Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
Privacy.11: Our Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.
Privacy.12: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, we advise you to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately, after they are posted on this page.
Privacy.13: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
